channel.title: heatmap on Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D.

item.title: Dissertation Themes
item.description: As I’ve wrapped up numerous cycles of qualitative coding of interview data for my dissertation, Into the edu-verse: New teachers seeking induction support on social media, I used geom_tile() in {ggplot2} to create heatmap plots to help me quickly visualize how thematic codes varied by interview participant.
